testcase.classname: feature to test Jiva design Yarn Sheet Acceptance screen functionality
testcase.name: Navigate to New Yarn sheet working and submit mu working details
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed Then the User enters "Ravi", and "Abcd@123".................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on Sweater module.................................................passed Then Click on the Yarn Sourcing Module......................................passed And Click on Data Entry in yarn sourcing....................................passed Then Click on the New yarn sheet working....................................passed And Click on style expansion in New yarn sheet working......................passed And Click on the Filter Icon in Style Expansion.............................passed And Enter the IPO "IPO1806" in Search By IPO................................passed And click on the Apply button...............................................passed And Select the IPO in the Styles List.......................................passed Then Verify the IPO details.................................................passed And Click on Edit button in MU Working grid.................................passed And Add data for the IPO MU Working details.................................passed
